question: What is the revenue of the company that acquired Youtube?

steps_plan.description: Identify the buyer_id of the company that acquired Youtube by searching the acquisitions table for the target_name 'Youtube'.
Using the buyer_id obtained from Step 1, look up the corresponding revenue in the companies table.

execution_trace.description: Identify the buyer_id of the company that acquired Youtube by searching the acquisitions table for the target_name 'Youtube'.
execution_trace.sql: SELECT buyer_id FROM acquisitions WHERE target_name = 'Youtube';

execution_trace.description: Using the buyer_id obtained from Step 1, look up the corresponding revenue in the companies table.
execution_trace.sql: SELECT revenue FROM companies WHERE id = 1;

question: Which company acquired GitHub and what is its revenue?

steps_plan.description: Identify the buyer_id from the acquisitions table where the target_name is 'GitHub'.
Using the buyer_id obtained from Step 1, retrieve the company name and revenue from the companies table.

execution_trace.description: Identify the buyer_id from the acquisitions table where the target_name is 'GitHub'.
execution_trace.sql: SELECT buyer_id FROM acquisitions WHERE target_name = 'GitHub';

execution_trace.description: Using the buyer_id obtained from Step 1, retrieve the company name and revenue from the companies table.
execution_trace.sql: SELECT name, revenue FROM companies WHERE id = 2;

question: Find the name of the company that acquired a target in the year 2006.

steps_plan.description: Identify the buyer_id(s) from the acquisitions table for acquisitions that occurred in the year 2006.
Use the buyer_id(s) from Step 1 to retrieve the corresponding company name(s) from the companies table.

execution_trace.description: Identify the buyer_id(s) from the acquisitions table for acquisitions that occurred in the year 2006.
execution_trace.sql: SELECT buyer_id FROM acquisitions WHERE year = 2006;

execution_trace.description: Use the buyer_id(s) from Step 1 to retrieve the corresponding company name(s) from the companies table.
execution_trace.sql: SELECT name FROM companies WHERE id = 1;
